fields.name: Chameleon User Terms and Conditions
fields.text:
• I will only use Chameleon resources to perform research work consistent with the goals of my project. I will not use Chameleon resources for activities related to financial gain, any unlawful purpose, or in a way that makes the work of other users difficult.
  • I also will acknowledge Chameleon in all publication presenting results or content obtained using Chameleon. The official acknowledgement is as follows: “Results presented in this paper were obtained using the Chameleon testbed supported by the National Science Foundation”.
  • I understand that non-compliance with the terms above will result in suspension of my account.

fields.name: Project Lead Terms and Conditions
fields.text:
• As a project lead I take responsibility for ensuring that users conducting work on the Chameleon testbed as part of my project observe the user terms and conditions.
  • I further agree to provide the Chameleon team with reports on the progress of my project as requested (at most bi-annually).
  • I understand that non-compliance with the terms above will result in suspension of my project and suspension of access to all the users holding allocations under this project.
